captions.text:
What's up? I am Ryan Tuerck and on this 
 episode of Tuerck, we are here in Philadelphia.

Anytime I get free weekend then I just love to 
 come to the city and visit my friends.
This time I brought a good bunch along.
... really about a pool, i guess!

Thank you for watching this episode of Tuerck! Share 
 the video if you like it.
Am I the first to drift FDR?

Lease some comments below,  remember to subscribe to Network 
 A for the rest of the Tuerck series.

title: Ryan Tuerck Invades Philadelphia, Drifts & Parties With Friends: Tuerck'd Ep. 4
